description: THIS REQUEST IS RESERVED FOR HOLDERS OF SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT # E60PV-19EQUI ONLY, FOR THE PURCHASE OF LABORATORY AND SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT, PARTS AND ACCESSORIES, SERVICES AND SUPPLIES.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Title
Two (2) Fume Hoods

#### Description
Environment and Climate Change Canada is soliciting bids from pre-qualified suppliers for the purchase of two (2) fume hoods. Interested suppliers must be registered on Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services, and Supplies.

#### Tender Details
- **Tender Reference Number**: cb-29-2193051
- **Amendment Number**: 3
- **Solicitation Number**: 5000070204R
- **Publication Date**: 2023-10-30
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-28T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-01-01
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31
- **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Supplier Requirements
Only suppliers registered on Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services, and Supplies are eligible to submit bids. Suppliers must download solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI /C from Buyandsell.gc.ca and submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

#### Bid Evaluation Criteria
Tenders will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

#### Regions of Operation and Delivery
Canada

#### Contact Information
- **Name**: Marie-Pier Dubois
- **Email**: mariepier.dubois2@ec.gc.ca
- **Phone**: (438) 316-0454

#### Tender Documents
A complete set of tender documents can be downloaded from the following URL:
- [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/23508/5000070204r\_npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/23508/5000070204r\_npp.pdf) (English)
- [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/23508/5000070204r\_apn.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/23508/5000070204r\_
